comments:
I  am using the Eclipse update manager to install, update, and uninstall
features for my Eclipse image. I get an error when I try to install a feature
with plugins that already exist on the platform. 


Steps to Reproduce:
1)  Install Eclipse by copying the files to a directory.
2)  Start the Eclipse help server
3)  Install Feature A (version1) containing plugins a (version1) and b
(version1) using the commandline update manager
4)  Stop/Start Eclipse server.
5)  Install Feature A (version2) containing plugins a (version1) and b
(version2) using the commandline update manager.
--> Feature A (version2) is not installed.


ERROR LOG:
!SESSION Jun 09, 2005 16:39:10.988 ---------------------------------------------

enabled: jitc)

Command-line arguments: -application org.eclipse.help.base.infocenterApplication
-plugincustomization [CUSTOMIZATION_PLUGIN]
